Stronger Together.
A Louder, Collaborative Voice.
Improve Outcomes.

Our goal is to have a unified voice and work together with Crumbl to improve operations and profitability. We are committed to understanding our rights as franchisees under the laws governed by the FTC.

The Crumbl Franchise Partner Association (CFPA) unites franchise partners to share solutions, strengthen profitability, and work constructively with corporate—backed by the resources of our AAFD chapter (joined Dec 2024).

Join CFPA    See Member Benefits

About

Who We Are

CFPA is the independent, member‑led association for Crumbl franchise partners. We organize owner priorities, collaborate with corporate on data‑driven improvements, and help members operate smarter—while educating franchisees on their rights under FTC rules.

How we work

  • Member‑Led. Transparent. Action‑Oriented.
  • Volunteer board, working committees, and monthly chapter calls.
  • Issue pipeline: intake → research → member vote → proposal → follow‑up.
  • Quarterly Crumbl CEO meetings for updates and published priorities.
  • Professional AAFD chapter management and voting tools.
Join CFPA Today

benefits

Strength in Numbers
Built on Partnership.

One Unified Voice

A community of franchise partners dedicated to excellence in the brand, solution-oriented, while protecting our businesses.

Private Slack Team

A private Slack with operators who've solved your issues, from staffing and tech to equipment. Get answers fast, share what works, skip failures.

Data-Driven Decisions

Surveys and benchmarks surface system-wide priorities. We turn insights into trackable plans, driving smarter decisions and better outcomes.

Legal Confidence

Access franchise-expert attorneys, an annual consult, and optional group funds. Gain proactive rights knowledge—empowering without conflict.

Friction-Reducing Programs

Explore health benefits, vetted partners, tools, and education to ease operations and protect margins. Leverage national scale for local impact.

Proven Impact

We've secured fairer delivery credits, improved vendor pricing, more savings options, and uniform timeline relief—guarding time and profits.

Amy Rahm selected as a AAFD Trailblazer

We are thrilled to acknowledge our CFPA board president, Amy Rahm, is the recipient of an AAFD Trailblazer Award, presented to members who work tirelessly to increase membership within their franchise chapter.

Strength in Numbers. Real Results.

From playbooks to advocacy wins, CFPA helps you protect margins and make better decisions—together.

Start My Membership

Testimonials

Member Testimonials

The following is a sampling of stories and testimonials of why our members have seeked to join and find value in their membership in the CFPA. Each quote represents a unique CFPA member, from-single unit to multi-unit franchise partners.

Crumbl Corp is highly innovative, yet FP & Corp motivations do not always align. To effectively address challenges, we must unite and speak with one voice. Without a united front, we risk working in isolation, undermining our collective strength.

We joined the association to be able to help our business grow and work with other franchise partners to better ourselves and each other as owners. Since corporate’s culture is far from a partnership and continues to make decisions based on their own corporate strategy, we believe this association would bring us together for positive change which would not be possible as individual owners. We want to be part of the bigger picture and the association allows us to do so as a collective voice.

Because of the disconnect between Franchise Partners' financial success coming from net profits of the individual store, and Corporate's financial success coming from revenue, I feel like Franchise Partners need a bigger voice to communicate the pain points of achieving profitability. There is also a lot of knowledge from in-store operations nationwide that corporate needs to rely on.

The association has been very helpful to my store in a variety of ways, but one of the biggest benefits I have seen is that we are able to gain insight, ideas, and advice in an instant from owners who are in their stores every day. It’s so valuable to learn from other store experts especially when the instructions from corporate are insufficient or unclear. The association has been very helpful to my store in a variety of ways, but one of the biggest benefits I have seen is that we are able to gain insight, ideas, and advice in an instant from owners who are in their stores every day. It’s so valuable to learn from other store experts especially when the instructions from corporate are insufficient or unclear.
